Rochester.James Monroe High School (Rochester, New:
James Monroe High School is a public high school in Rochester, operated by the Rochester City School District.


== History ==
James Monroe High School, located on Alexander Street at the corner of Pearl Street, was completed and occupied as a Junior high school in September, 1923. In June; 1924, the first Junior high school graduation exercises were held, and because of crowded conditions at East High School, it was decided to retain tenth-year pupils in the school for at least a year.
